conclusion: To find moments when speed is 5 m/s, analyze slope of tangent line on graph.
Tangent line drawn at specific point on curve; slope gives instantaneous velocity.
Slope of tangent is change in displacement over change in time.
Find points where slope of tangent line is Â±5 m/s.
Graph shows tangent line indicating points where slope is -5 m/s.
If there is one point with velocity -5 m/s, there should be a symmetrical point with velocity 5 m/s.
There are two moments within 0 to 4 seconds where speed is 5 m/s.
